title: Examing the Relationship between Fiscal Policy and Income Inequality in Australia: A Structural Vector Autoregression Analysis
text: Abstract. Using data from the Australian Bureau of Statistics, this paper attempts to understand how changes in fiscal policy impact income inequality in Australia using a Structural Vector Autoregression (SVAR) approach.

title: Examing the Relationship between Fiscal Policy and Income Inequality in Australia: A Structural Vector Autoregression Analysis
